name: Steve G Jones
what_you_do: Dr. Steve G. Jones is a clinical hypnotherapist who specializes in hypnotherapy for various conditions, including weight loss, anxiety, smoking cessation, and more. He also provides motivational techniques for sales teams.
who_you_serve: Dr. Steve serves individuals seeking self-improvement and businesses looking to enhance employee motivation and performance.
signature_programs: Author of over 22 books on hypnotherapy
bio: Featured in Forbes and People; charges $25,000 for two-hour sessions with top executives and celebrities.
business_focus: Dr. Steve G. Jones is a clinical hypnotherapist who specializes in hypnotherapy for various conditions, including weight loss, anxiety, smoking cessation, and more. He also provides motivational techniques for sales teams.
